synopsis.text: And so begins the tale of Toshiaki Gozu, a young man who finds himself inexplicably reincarnated in the world of his favorite video game, standing face-to-face with the game's final boss, the demon king Evelogia. With a deep admiration for the loathsome villain, Toshiaki confesses his love for Evelogia, rejecting his destined role as the assassin of the demon king. Instead, he allies himself with the lonely and misunderstood Evelogia, who is overwhelmed by the trust and affection shown by Toshiaki. Together, they embark on a journey to overcome their destinies and live regular lives, but face challenges as Evelogia struggles with his uncontrollable destructive power and Toshiaki's growing obsession with the antagonist. As they encounter new characters and obstacles, will they be able to conquer the world and overcome their destinies? Only time will tell in this thrilling and romantic adventure.
